org.mapsforge.map.android.layer
Class MyLocationOverlay

java.lang.Object
  org.mapsforge.map.layer.Layer
      org.mapsforge.map.android.layer.MyLocationOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.location.LocationListener
public class MyLocationOverlay
extends Layer
implements android.location.LocationListener

A thread-safe Layer implementation to display the current location.

Constructor Detail

MyLocationOverlay

public MyLocationOverlay(android.content.Context context,
                         MapViewPosition mapViewPosition,
                         Bitmap bitmap)
Constructs a new MyLocationOverlay with the default circle paints.

Parameters:
context - a reference to the application context.
mapViewPosition - the MapViewPosition whose location will be updated.
bitmap - a bitmap to display at the current location (might be null).

MyLocationOverlay

public MyLocationOverlay(android.content.Context context,
                         MapViewPosition mapViewPosition,
                         Bitmap bitmap,
                         Paint circleFill,
                         Paint circleStroke)
Constructs a new MyLocationOverlay with the given circle paints.

Parameters:
context - a reference to the application context.
mapViewPosition - the MapViewPosition whose location will be updated.
bitmap - a bitmap to display at the current location (might be null).
circleFill - the Paint used to fill the circle that represents the current location (might be null).
circleStroke - the Paint used to stroke the circle that represents the current location (might be null).
Method Detail

locationToLatLong

public static LatLong locationToLatLong(android.location.Location location)
Parameters:
location - the location whose geographical coordinates should be converted.
Returns:
a new LatLong with the geographical coordinates taken from the given location.

disableMyLocation

public void disableMyLocation()
Stops the receiving of location updates. Has no effect if location updates are already disabled.

draw

public void draw(BoundingBox boundingBox,
                 byte zoomLevel,
                 Canvas canvas,
                 Point canvasPosition)
Specified by:
draw in class Layer

enableMyLocation

public boolean enableMyLocation(boolean centerAtFirstFix)
Enables the receiving of location updates from the most accurate LocationProvider available.

Parameters:
centerAtFirstFix - whether the map should be centered to the first received location fix.
Returns:
true if at least one location provider was found, false otherwise.

getLastLocation

public android.location.Location getLastLocation()
Returns:
the most-recently received location fix (might be null).

isCenterAtNextFix

public boolean isCenterAtNextFix()
Returns:
true if the map will be centered at the next received location fix, false otherwise.

isMyLocationEnabled

public boolean isMyLocationEnabled()
Returns:
true if the receiving of location updates is currently enabled, false otherwise.

isSnapToLocationEnabled

public boolean isSnapToLocationEnabled()
Returns:
true if the snap-to-location mode is enabled, false otherwise.
